title: Missing background-color in admin interface
description:
CSS in the sdmin interface sets color: #333, but no background-color; if the user has a dark default background set in their browser it is illegible.

Adding background-color: #fff; to the "body, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, a, button, input, select, option, textarea, th, td" rule in common.css fixes it.

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content:
Can you provide a simple patch to css/angular/common.css? I'll apply it.

Thanks!
